Message:
Steeling myself, I held out
my hands to a knight
lying in the rubble.

But, he simply clasped them
as though to console me,
and said, “Thank you...”

When I raised my head,
I saw everyone was looking
at me with warmth in their eyes...

“There is no evil witch bringing
harm to the people here—

only a benevolent saint
blessing us with a miracle.”

...Ahh, I really do
have a lot to learn...

Deep down I knew...
that not everyone could
possibly see me as a monster...
But, because I’m a witch...
I just gave up...

If I give up, though...
I can’t save the ones
who need me most.

I need to be strong enough
to face whatever may come.
I won’t waver any longer...
both as a witch...and as a healer.

After all, the world is
filled with so much warm,
gentle light...
